description: This file defines a Java data transfer object (DTO) class named FundTransferRequest, used for encapsulating the details of a fund transfer request in a financial application. It contains fields for fromAccount, toAccount, and amount, representing the sender's account, receiver's account, and the transfer amount respectively.

classes.name: FundTransferRequest
classes.description: A DTO class to hold fund transfer details including source account, destination account, and transfer amount.

methods.name: getter/setter methods generated by Lombok's @Data
methods.description: Lombok's @Data annotation automatically generates getter and setter methods for all fields, as well as equals, hashCode, and toString methods.
